body: Well im round my nans and she doesnt have the best wifi in the world every now and again im getting disconnected . This time i was on sentex and i just go knocked out the work and before i died my nans wifi went off and i tried to re join and i was tempbanned for combat logging please help or unban me <u>its not my fault !</u>

title: Please help or unban me please :)
